import java.util.Scanner;
import java.math.*;
class peerimexponential
{
	public static void main(String args[])
	{
		int a,b;
		Scanner scan=new Scanner(System.in);
		a=scan.nextInt();
		b=scan.nextInt();
		String str="";
		str+=a;
		BigInteger c=new BigInteger(str);
		c=c.pow(b);
		BigInteger n,s;
		s=BigInteger.ZERO;
		n=c;
		while(n.compareTo(BigInteger.ZERO)!=0)
		{
			s=s.add(n.mod(new BigInteger("10")));
			n=n.divide(new BigInteger("10"));
		}
		System.out.println(c.toString()+"\n"+s.toString());
	}
}
